segments.en: Numbered Discourses 10
12. The Ceremony of Descent
114. Bad Principles (2nd)
“Mendicants, you should know bad principles and good principles.
And you should know bad results and good results.

segments.pli: Adhammañca viditvā dhammañca, anatthañca viditvā atthañca yathā dhammo yathā attho tathā paṭipajjitabbaṃ.
segments.en: Knowing these things, your practice should follow the good principles with good results.

segments.pli: Katamo ca, bhikkhave, adhammo, katamo ca dhammo, katamo ca anattho, katamo ca attho?
segments.en: So what are bad principles? What are good principles? What are bad results? And what are good results?
Wrong view is a bad principle.
Right view is a good principle.

segments.pli: ye ca micchādiṭṭhipaccayā aneke pāpakā akusalā dhammā sambhavanti, ayaṃ anattho;
segments.en: And the many bad, unskillful qualities produced by wrong view are bad results.

segments.pli: sammādiṭṭhipaccayā ca aneke kusalā dhammā bhāvanāpāripūriṃ gacchanti, ayaṃ attho. (1)
segments.en: And the many skillful qualities fully developed because of right view are good results.
Wrong thought is a bad principle.
Right thought is a good principle.

segments.pli: ye ca micchāsaṅkappapaccayā aneke pāpakā akusalā dhammā sambhavanti, ayaṃ anattho;
segments.en: And the many bad, unskillful qualities produced by wrong thought are bad results.

segments.pli: sammāsaṅkappapaccayā ca aneke kusalā dhammā bhāvanāpāripūriṃ gacchanti, ayaṃ attho. (2)
segments.en: And the many skillful qualities fully developed because of right thought are good results.
Wrong speech is a bad principle.
Right speech is a good principle.

segments.pli: ye ca micchāvācāpaccayā aneke pāpakā akusalā dhammā sambhavanti, ayaṃ anattho;
segments.en: And the many bad, unskillful qualities produced by wrong speech are bad results.

segments.pli: sammāvācāpaccayā ca aneke kusalā dhammā bhāvanāpāripūriṃ gacchanti, ayaṃ attho. (3)
segments.en: And the many skillful qualities fully developed because of right speech are good results.
Wrong action is a bad principle.
Right action is a good principle.

segments.pli: ye ca micchākammantapaccayā aneke pāpakā akusalā dhammā sambhavanti, ayaṃ anattho;
segments.en: And the many bad, unskillful qualities produced by wrong action are bad results.

segments.pli: sammākammantapaccayā ca aneke kusalā dhammā bhāvanāpāripūriṃ gacchanti, ayaṃ attho. (4)
segments.en: And the many skillful qualities fully developed because of right action are good results.
Wrong livelihood is a bad principle.
Right livelihood is a good principle.

segments.pli: ye ca micchāājīvapaccayā aneke pāpakā akusalā dhammā sambhavanti, ayaṃ anattho;
segments.en: And the many bad, unskillful qualities produced by wrong livelihood are bad results.

segments.pli: sammāājīvapaccayā ca aneke kusalā dhammā bhāvanāpāripūriṃ gacchanti, ayaṃ attho. (5)
segments.en: And the many skillful qualities fully developed because of right livelihood are good results.
Wrong effort is a bad principle.
Right effort is a good principle.

segments.pli: ye ca micchāvāyāmapaccayā aneke pāpakā akusalā dhammā sambhavanti, ayaṃ anattho;
segments.en: And the many bad, unskillful qualities produced by wrong effort are bad results.

segments.pli: sammāvāyāmapaccayā ca aneke kusalā dhammā bhāvanāpāripūriṃ gacchanti, ayaṃ attho. (6)
segments.en: And the many skillful qualities fully developed because of right effort are good results.
Wrong mindfulness is a bad principle.
Right mindfulness is a good principle.

segments.pli: ye ca micchāsatipaccayā aneke pāpakā akusalā dhammā sambhavanti, ayaṃ anattho;
segments.en: And the many bad, unskillful qualities produced by wrong mindfulness are bad results.

segments.pli: sammāsatipaccayā ca aneke kusalā dhammā bhāvanāpāripūriṃ gacchanti, ayaṃ attho. (7)
segments.en: And the many skillful qualities fully developed because of right mindfulness are good results.
Wrong immersion is a bad principle.
Right immersion is a good principle.

segments.pli: ye ca micchāsamādhipaccayā aneke pāpakā akusalā dhammā sambhavanti, ayaṃ anattho;
segments.en: And the many bad, unskillful qualities produced by wrong immersion are bad results.

segments.pli: sammāsamādhipaccayā ca aneke kusalā dhammā bhāvanāpāripūriṃ gacchanti, ayaṃ attho. (8)
segments.en: And the many skillful qualities fully developed because of right immersion are good results.
Wrong knowledge is a bad principle.
Right knowledge is a good principle.

segments.pli: ye ca micchāñāṇapaccayā aneke pāpakā akusalā dhammā sambhavanti, ayaṃ anattho;
segments.en: And the many bad, unskillful qualities produced by wrong knowledge are bad results.

segments.pli: sammāñāṇapaccayā ca aneke kusalā dhammā bhāvanāpāripūriṃ gacchanti, ayaṃ attho. (9)
segments.en: And the many skillful qualities fully developed because of right knowledge are good results.
Wrong freedom is a bad principle.
Right freedom is a good principle.

segments.pli: ye ca micchāvimuttipaccayā aneke pāpakā akusalā dhammā sambhavanti, ayaṃ anattho;
segments.en: And the many bad, unskillful qualities produced by wrong freedom are bad results.

segments.pli: sammāvimuttipaccayā ca aneke kusalā dhammā bhāvanāpāripūriṃ gacchanti, ayaṃ attho. (10)
segments.en: And the many skillful qualities fully developed because of right freedom are good results.
‘You should know bad principles and good principles.
And you should know bad results and good results.

segments.pli: Adhammañca viditvā dhammañca, anatthañca viditvā atthañca yathā dhammo yathā attho tathā paṭipajjitabban’ti,
segments.en: Knowing these things, your practice should follow the good principles with good results.’

segments.pli: iti yaṃ taṃ vuttaṃ, idametaṃ paṭicca vuttan”ti.
segments.en: That’s what I said, and this is why I said it.”
